https://tmrev.io/movie/481104-Don't Lose Heart 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4KhFAcMEeZOI68Nx5dpnlJSI8fe.jpg Depicts the life of best-selling Japanese poet Toyo Shibata. Toyo Shibata first began writing poems at the age of 92 and published her first collection of poems "Kujikenaide" (″Don't lose heart″) in 2009, which sold over 1.5 million copies. Don't Lose Heart
